item.title: Signal System Tray Icon Why Doesn't It Have One?
item.description: Almost all the other chat clients I have can run in the background showing only a system tray icon… Why can’t Signal? Slack Discord WhatsDesk (WhatsApp) I think: Facebook Messenger – Or it just harasses me. I guess if they did so I would hope that it at least has some marker to show that conversation has happened.
